attributes.title: Very racist
attributes.review: I tried downloading this app and it refused to work for Mel I pretty sure it because of my color. To all my colored trump supporting fellows out there. Reconsider your stance.

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD!
attributes.review: This app is absolutely horrible, and should NOT be in the App Store! Do not make the mistake of downloading this! It took me two days to get my phone working again!

attributes.title: Don’t get this app
attributes.review: Get this app below a 1 star rating

attributes.title: THIS IS A BAD APP
attributes.review:
It toke a whole year to download and when it did everything went crazy!😪My lights were flashing saying hey cutie. I was so scared. Then my cat turned into a Cheeto puff( if you need reference to what it looked like just think of Donald Trump) my cat 🐱had MAGA hat on so I had to shoot it 420💥times.Then my tv📺 turned on. It was the scariest😱thing I ever seen I was crying😭.... it was.. the one and only orange🍊. I ran out my house. I tried to call 911 but an alien started saying weird thing. Then i left and never returned to my house again💔. So hi I’m writing this as I am homeless living in a box 📦.
The moral of the story don’t get this app.

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: For starters, it says to “keep America great” and the last time I took a look around.... we aren’t doing too hot. It also took way to long to download. I would never recommend this app.. even to the Karen’s, they can do better.

attributes.title: Garbage app
attributes.review: it doesn’t even work or have good information

attributes.title: app gave my phone a virus
attributes.review: My phone started malfunctioning 5 minutes after i downloaded it now im sitting here typing this review with a brand new phone. at least i got a new phone 😒

attributes.title: #Dissapointed
attributes.review: I was absolutely appalled by the overall lack of professionalism on this app. It’s riddled with grammatical and function errors. It also asked for my social security number which is completely unnecessary and out of line. I’m disgusted. Do better. Have some respect for yourself Donald.🥰🧚🏻✨xoxo

attributes.title: Caused death
attributes.review: Sister Was told to inject herself with bleach and died a horrible death due to trump🌈
